mapper.insert: insert into orders (number, status, user_id, address_book_id, order_time, checkout_time, pay_method, pay_status, amount, remark, phone, address, consignee, estimated_delivery_time, delivery_status, pack_amount, tableware_number, tableware_status) values (#{number}, #{status}, #{userId}, #{addressBookId}, #{orderTime}, #{checkoutTime}, #{payMethod}, #{payStatus}, #{amount}, #{remark}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{consignee}, #{estimatedDeliveryTime}, #{deliveryStatus}, #{packAmount}, #{tablewareNumber}, #{tablewareStatus})

insert into order_detail (order_id, dish_id, setmeal_id, name, image, dish_flavor, number, amount) values
(#{orderDetail.orderId}, #{orderDetail.dishId}, #{orderDetail.setmealId}, #{orderDetail.name}, #{orderDetail.image}, #{orderDetail.dishFlavor}, #{orderDetail.number}, #{orderDetail.amount})
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN status = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS toBeConfirmed, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS confirmed, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS deliveryInProgress FROM orders
